name: Hikarimuji #8
description:
Also referred to as Ogon, the Hikarimuji category is made up of brightly colored metallic koi including: Yamabuki (yellow), Purachina (platinum), Orenji (orange), Nezu (grey) and a burnished gold colored Mukashi Ogon.

By crossbreeding the Hikarimuji with other existing varieties, breeders have been able to create a myriad of new varieties. Included in this category are koi with a pinecone-like pattern known as Matsuba.
